---
name: User Story
about: Feature description from the point of a user
title: 'User Story: '
---
## Description

**As a** [HR person | member | ... ]

**I want to** ...
[Something the user wants to do, like "put items into my shopping card"]

**So that** ...
[How does it help the user? What is achieved by this?]
